Reviews.Title: Best laptop for the money you can buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Best laptop for the money you can buy. Intel i7 offers very fast computations, as well as extremely fast web experiences. 12 g of memory and 1 t hard drive, excellent combination.

ProductInfo.Features:
4th generation Intel Core i7-4700MQ Processor
15.6-inch diagonal HD BrightView LED
12GB DDR3L SDRAM (2 DIMM)
1TB 5400RPM hard drive
Intel HD graphics 4600
ProductInfo.Name: Hp Envy Touchsmart 15 Notebook Pc with 4th Generation Intel Core I7-4700mq Processor 12gb Ram 1tb Harddrive
